Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering     Search the site     Toggle Menu      Search                  Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering      Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering   Main Menu    Undergraduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Accreditation    CE Major    EE Major    EP Major    Courses    Internships and Jobs    Minors    Student Groups    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Graduate           Admitted Students    Admissions    Courses    MS Program    PhD Program    PhD Dissertations    Post-Graduation Outcomes    Student Profiles    Student Resources         Research           Research Areas    Featured Research    Labs    Research Experiences for Undergraduates    Sponsors         Faculty and Staff           Department Head    Faculty    Emeritus Faculty    Adjunct Faculty    Professional Organizations    Resources    Staff    Open Positions         News    Events     Eyebrow menu    Giving    Alumni    College of Engineering Home    UIC menu    UIC.edu    Campus Map       Search               View Menu           Breadcrumbs   Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering    Undergraduate    Undergraduate Student Resources        Undergraduate Student Resources  This page provides information, forms, policies, and procedures for current UIC undergraduates in electrical and computer engineering. If there is any department, college, or university information that you need and don’t see here, please email us to let us know, and we will do our best to add it!       Forms   College of Engineering forms   Find all forms (online and print) on the COE undergraduate resources page   ECE department forms   Petition form to take an ECE course without all prerequisites  Transfer student ECE 115 approval form        Helpful links and guides    Academic calendar  Class schedules: access via my.uic.edu  Counseling Center  Course catalog page for ECE  Courses page  Disability Resource Center  ECE calendar  ECE computing  Engineering Career Center  Faculty and staff directory  Faculty office hours: see individual faculty profile pages  Guaranteed Paid Internship Program: Freshmen  Guaranteed Paid Internship Program: Transfers  Guaranteed Professional Program Admissions  Honors College tutoring  CE major:  Requirements | Curriculum: Old – New | Flowchart  EE major:  Requirements | Curriculum: Old – New | Flowchart  EP major:  Requirements | Curriculum: Old – New | Flowchart  MakerSpace  Math and Sciences Learning Center  my.uic.edu  Research Experiences for Undergraduates  Scholarships at UIC COE  Tracks within ECE  Transferring between UIC colleges  Undergraduate advisor listing        Teaching assignments    Spring 2020 teaching assignments  Fall 2019 teaching assignments  Summer 2019 teaching assignments  Spring 2019 teaching assignments  Summer 2018 teaching assignments  Fall 2018 teaching assignments        TA Room List    Spring 2020 TA room list  Fall 2019 TA room list  Spring 2019 TA room list  Fall 2018 TA room list  Summer 2018 TA room list        Students with disabilities   UIC is committed to full inclusion and participation of people with disabilities in all aspects of university life. Students who face or anticipate disability-related barriers while at UIC should connect with the Disability Resource Center (DRC) on the web at drc.uic.edu , by email at drc@uic.edu , or by phone at (312) 413-2183 to create a plan for reasonable accommodations.  In order to receive accommodations, students must disclose disability to the DRC, complete an interactive registration process with the DRC, and provide their course instructor with a Letter of Accommodation. Course instructors in receipt of a Letter of Accommodation will work with the student and the DRC to implement approved accommodations.       Where to go for help        Email   Write to us at ugrad-info@uic.ece.edu and we will respond to you as soon as we can.         In person   Please visit the ECE department office in SEO 1020 or the undergraduate academic advising office in SEO 123.
